message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the time we have to negotiate.
Your offer was a bit too tilted Alice. Let's meet in the middle, time is money!
Bob, time is money indeed, and we're losing it! This is a strong offer considering the dwindling value.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my last offer before we both start losing significant amounts!
Bob, I understand the urgency. This is a compromise - let's settle it now and avoid further losses.
